comment: Awesome instructor Very caring and very experienced with patients  Knows how to get the vibe of the class and knows just how far to push Loved his classes I learned a lot
Dr Giles very passionate about his work and love the examples in class he's very real world and hands on

Dr. Giles gives his ll to the class and I wish I could just download the stuff he knows and has seen. He uses a lot of real life examples which makes it easier to understand. Hes very real and down to earth and I watched him with patients and he is AMAZING
